activities:
Boost eLearning track’s user activity at the skill level.  We track how much of every second of every skill a user watches.   Several data fields, see below, are provided from user during the openid federated login using their Google Apps account. No other user personal information is tracked. The application also tracks usage information by user such as what training was viewed, for reporting purposes.  The data fields are:
First Name
Last Name
Email
First Viewed
Last Viewed
View completion by skill
This figure gets totaled to know lesson completion percentage and course completion
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client domain name and subscription status.  User first name, last name, email.  When they first, most recently, and total access of the application
recoursemech:
Boost eLearning will cooperate with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) with regard to all categories of data covered by our self-certification.

Privacy policy is included in the application hosted at gat.boostelearning.com.  Only provisioned users have access to the application.

Contact information is provided on the privacy policy with an email: privacy@boostelearning.com
